title: Upcoming events
text: No new events are scheduled at the time.

title: About
text:
The Bioinformatics Hub (BioinfoHub) at the Center for Molecular Medicine (CMM) Karolinska Institutet was established in 2024. We aim to foster collaboration and discussion within the bioinformatics community. The hub hosts bi-monthly lunch workshops and organizes engaging social events, creating a vibrant space for knowledge sharing and networking.
Welcome!

title: Recommended Courses & Resources
text:
Welcome! If youâ€™re new to coding or want to learn key tools used in bioinformatics and data science, here are some great free online resources to get you started.




Getting started with R and RStudio A free and basic course of R and Rstudio. Here you will find instructions on how to install R and Rstudio and some practical examples.
Basic Basics Another basic course in R which includes some videos.
Clean it up Basics on data cleaning.
R for Data Science (R4DS) 2nd edition
A free, comprehensive online book by Hadley Wickham that teaches R with the tidyverse ecosystem. Hands-on and beginner-friendly.
tidyverse.org - Learn
Official tidyverse tutorials and resources curated for learning modern R packages.






Python for Everybody (University of Michigan)






Posit cheatsheets

title: The Bioinformatics Hub at the Center for Molecular Medicine (CMM)
text: Welcome to the BioinfoHub at the Center for Molecular Medicine (CMM), where we collaborate, learn, and innovate in bioinformatics! Stay tuned for updates, new repositories, and upcoming events!
